# Project Overview

This is a sample document for testing the RAG pipeline.

## Goals

The primary goal is to demonstrate semantic document retrieval.

### Success Metrics

- 90% retrieval relevance
- Less than 5 second query latency
- Source traceability for all answers

## Architecture

The system uses a vector database for similarity search.

### Components

The main components are:
- Embedding model for text vectorization
- FAISS index for nearest neighbor search
- Azure OpenAI for answer generation

## Conclusion

This document serves as a test fixture for unit testing.
